original_title: BABYMETAL - Live at Budokan: Red Night Apocalypse - Akai Yoru Legend
overview: Features one of two concerts performed by BABYMETAL's at Nippon Budokan held on March 1 & 2, 2014  Track List:  (1) Megitsune Extended Intro  (2) Doki Doki Morning  (3) Gimme Chocolate  (4) Iine!  (5) Catch Me If You Can (w/Kami Band Instrumental)  (6) Uki Uki Midnight  (7) Mischief Of The Metal Gods (Kami Band Instrumetal)  (8) Akumu no Rondo  (9) Onedari Daisakusen  (10) 4 No Uta  (11) Akatsuki  (12) Babymetal Death  (13) Head Bangya  (14) Ijime, Dame, Zettai
title: BABYMETAL - Live at Budokan: Red Night Apocalypse - Akai Yoru Legend
